changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE articles ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, author_id BIGINT NOT NULL, author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, content LONGBLOB NOT NULL, serial_number VARCHAR(255), category VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, create_date DATE, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: test
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE comments ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, comment_body BLOB NOT NULL, article_id BIGINT NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, create_date DATETIME NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_com_article FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
